full_summary:
### Solicitation for Air Leakage Testing Services

**Title**: RFP - Air Leakage Testing Services
**Reference Number**: WS4272467082-Doc4272540226

**Amendment Notice**: This solicitation is subject to an amendment, issued on October 29, 2023, changing the closing time for the tender submission.

**Description**:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) and the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invite bidders to provide air leakage testing services for up to seven heritage buildings across Canada. The testing will be conducted on a "as-and-when-requested" basis, using task authorizations, in accordance with Annex "A", Statement of Work. The services are divided into three project streams, and bidders may submit a bid for one or more of these streams.

**Project Streams:**

1. **Large Buildings in the National Capital Region (NCR) and Québec Region**: This project stream involves testing large heritage buildings in the NCR and Québec Region.
2. **Western Region**: This project stream covers the testing of heritage buildings in the Western Region of Canada.
3. **Small Buildings in the NCR**: This project stream involves the testing of small heritage buildings in the National Capital Region.

**Solicitation Status**: The tender is closed, and the deadline for bid submission was December 4, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Teresa Cuffari
* Email: [teresa.cuffari@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:teresa.cuffari@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
